libhb: add an additioonal chapter at the beginning when needed  hb_chapter_t stores only the duration, so if the first chapter does not start at the beginning, we need to an additional entry to preserve the chapters times.

libhb: set Dolby Vision profile 5 color tag  as recommend by the latest Dolby Vision specification.

actions: update macOS runners to version 26  Update python and install the now optional Metal toolchain.
libhb: increase decomb and comb_detect maximum number of threads  Improve performance on CPU with an high number of cores, for example like AMD Threadripper

libhb: cli: ui: support custom channels order (#7265)  Fixes the mapping of audio channels in PCM tracks with custom layouts. Fixes #6300.
WinGui: Fix an issue where the denoise combo box would not populate items correctly when editing jobs. Fixes #7252
MacGui: use NSItemBadge on macOS 26 instead of our custom badge class
libhb: MacGui: fix Xcode 26 warnings
Bump Version to 1.10.3
libhb: allow FFV1 in MP4 container  Fixes #7242.
libhb: map FFV1 auto level to 3

MacGui: discard cached previews after 60 seconds  NSCache is supposed to discard its content automatically when needed, but it seems to avoid doing so until the system memory pressure is quite high, so discard them manually.

update NEWS

WinGui: Add Warning for Out of Date drivers on Nvidia GPUs to the log header. - Automatically turn off nvdec if an unsupported driver is detected. - Automatically turn off qsv decode if an unsupported driver is detected.  (cherry picked from commit f673b346ea5251240bf8ece5a0ca371a25daae8b)
Update NEWS
contrib: update HarfBuzz to 11.4.5 (#7223)
WinGui: Attempt to fix some incorrect behaviour on CQ/RF calcuations and handling of presets around this.  Fixes #7240
contrib: delete A01-autoconf-version.patch file (#7235)  Not necessary anymore for Ubuntu 24 and newer.

libhb: use RtlGetVersion() to get OS version on Windows (MinGW) (#7230)  Microsoft broke GetVersionEx() starting with Windows 8.1. The function now returns incorrect values unless the application manifest specifically lists the newer releases as supported:  https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/w8cookbook/operating-system-version-changes-in-windows-8-1 https://sourceware.org/pipermail/cygwin/2024-March/255728.html  To avoid this problem, call the documented RtlGetVersion() from ntdll:  https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-hardware/drivers/ddi/wdm/nf-wdm-rtlgetversion
contrib: update to FFmpeg 8 (#7201)
Update NEWS
libhb: use the correct stride for high depth motion metrics  fix a regression introduced in 71eeb9a.
MacGui: try to recreate the tmp folder only on macOS 14 and later  It shouldn't make a difference, but maybe it will help on macOS 13.
contrib: update SVT-AV1 to 3.1.2 (#7225)
WinGui: Add tooltips with the name and keyboard shotcut (If it has one) to the toolbar buttons. This is useful when using HandBrake with the classic menu disabled.

WinGui: Improved app keyboard navigation. - Toolbar dropdown buttons now respond to Space and Enter keys to actviate them for consistency with the rest of the toolbar buttons. - The Log and Queue windows now respond to the Esc key to close them.
WinGui: Remove the old Preset Manager Prototype UI
WinGui: New preference that changes the preset button on the toolbar to a context menu rather than an overlay. This may be better for accessibility.
WinGui: Bump Version to 1.10.2  (cherry picked from commit 192e327982ce8bf032b6a648539185002529a07d)
MacGui: manually copy preview images  Might fix a weird crash on Apple Silicon.
WinGui: UX improvements to the update page. - Layout Improvements. - Link to Release Notes. - Handle cancelled updates better. - Display new version
WinGui: Bump version to 1.10.1
Update NEWS
contrib: update HarfBuzz to 11.4.2 (#7155)
LinGui: add missing braces  Fix compilation on LLVM 21.1.0 / 20.1.8.
libhb: write the OS version to the log  On macOS and Linux/Unix for now.
contrib: backport a SVT-AV1 patch to fix a Neon bug
WinGui: Remove Arm64 DLL check as it's no longer needed.
Update NEWS
WinGui: convert track names to UTF-8 C strings  Fix #7189.
MacGui: remove an erroneous setFrameFromString call
LinGUI: Update translation template
LinGUI: Update metainfo
LinGUI: Replace some more deprecated functions
LinGUI: Fix misleading indentation
LinGUI: Add summary preview pager  Allows the preview image to be cycled through from the summary page.
LinGUI: Use system setting for animations  The animation setting is read from the gtk-enable-animations property, which is propagated from the desktop environment.

LinGUI: Support relative locale dir  Instead of using a hardcoded location for gettext message catalogs, determine the location relative to the binary install dir. Alternatively, the TEXTDOMAINDIR environment variable can be used to specify the location directly, for example during development.  Fixes https://github.com/HandBrake/HandBrake/issues/7058

LinGUI: Add UI language preference  Allows the user to select the language to display the user interface in. The language ids correspond to the glibc locales used on Linux.  Fixes https://github.com/HandBrake/HandBrake/issues/6393
LinGUI: Improve display of file sizes
LinGUI: Fix disk space checks  The free space measurements now use 1KB = 1000 bytes everywhere, for consistency.

LinGUI: Use GtkFileLauncher and GtkUriLauncher  These APIs has been available since GTK 4.10 and make use of the xdg-desktop-portal OpenURI portal. This allows HandBrake to open files in Flatpak applications properly, and allows the user to choose the application to open files in.
Fix for Vorbis passthrough checkbox not being applying when title changes (#7187)
WinGui: Cosmetic improvement on the Audio Tab. Audio Track can auto-expand for abnormally long track names. Fixes #7147
WinGui: Fix a minor cosmetic issue on the queue when file sizes are exceptionally small. Fixes #7159
MacGui: update community link

Update NEWS
Update NEWS
[winGUI] Add romanian language
contrib: backport a fix for SVT-AV1 tune ssim at preset 10, 9, and 8
Update Transifex URLs as they appear to have changed their end at some point.
contrib: apply a x265 patch to fix a bitstream issue  x265 generates some out of specs motion vector differences that cause visible blocks on some hardware decoders.
MacGui: validate the custom border color textfield and improve the tooltip  Fix #7135.
flatpak: Add pulseaudio socket for preview audio
ci: Remove unneeded packages from flatpak.yml

build(deps): bump actions/download-artifact from 4 to 5  Bumps [actions/download-artifact](https://github.com/actions/download-artifact) from 4 to 5. - [Release notes](https://github.com/actions/download-artifact/releases) - [Commits](https://github.com/actions/download-artifact/compare/v4...v5)  --- updated-dependencies: - dependency-name: actions/download-artifact   dependency-version: '5'   dependency-type: direct:production   update-type: version-update:semver-major ...  Signed-off-by: dependabot[bot] <support@github.com>
WinGui: Bin the concept of Split HBFunctions
WinGui: Tidyup Styles / missing resource
WinGui: Refactor the way the styles are loaded to allow potential future modern theme to be implemented.
Update NEWS
contrib: backport a zimg avx2 check fix
libhb: do not use zscale if the CPU has got no AVX2  AVX optimizations were removed from zimg.

MacGui: fix a crash on launch on macOS 10.13  The macOS 15 SDK doesn't link correctly QuickLookUI.framework, so manually weak link it to avoid a crash on macOS 10.13 where it's not a separate framework.

LinGUI: Disable SendTo in Flatpak without flatpak-spawn  Disable the Send To option if running in Flatpak and the org.freedesktop.Flatpak bus is unavailable as it won't work. Users can enable the permission override manually using Flatseal by adding org.freedesktop.Flatpak under HandBrake > Session Bus > Talks.
LinGUI: Remove --talk-name=org.freedesktop.Flatpak  This option allows sandbox escape and is therefore restricted on Flathub.
contrib: update libdovi to version 3.3.2
WinGui: Fix an issue where preset order is inconsistent between the display modes. Fixes #7114
contrib: backport a fix for x265 2 pass mode
contrib: fix x265 cross-compilation  Compiling the arm64 version on a x86_64 Mac now works.
LinGUI: Fix custom tmp dir and avoid setenv  As multiple threads are running by this point, using setenv() here is unsafe.

qsv: Initialize libva without using setenv  Uses vaSetDriverName to try the different Intel drivers, as it is not safe to call setenv() with multiple threads running. As there is no way to unset the driver name, we must try the default method with no name before trying other driver names.
libhb: set AVFMT_FLAG_BITEXACT flag  Avoid having the 'Encoded by' metadata filled by libavformat by default.
libhb: fix various clang static analyzer warnings
Update NEWS
actions: update macOS runners to macOS 15
WinGui: remove unused class
[LinuxGUI] Update dutch and swedish locale (#7106)
Add locale update to NEWS
[macGUI] Update all locales
winGUI: update locales and remove non-maintained ones
libhb: fix build on gcc 15
libhb: fix qsv hw device init
libhb: cosmetics
libhb: fix a hw frames context leak  When creating the black buffer, the hw frames context was never freed.

preset: update AV1 and Social presets  Use higher quality presets for SVT-AV1 due to the recent speed improvements. Disable metadata passthru in Social presets now that the location metadata is preserved.
libhb: gracefully fail when an hw device can't be created
libhb: improve qsv device selection logging
libhb: fix the hw device selection  Don't ignore the dictionary with the child device index.
libhb: properly match amf presets  Fix #7095.
LinGUI: update locales and remove non-maintained ones (#7086)
contrib: use absolute dir path when building libdovi  Fix a build issue that happens with older cargo-c versions"
MacGui: update Sparkle to version 2.7.1
Update NEWS
contrib: update HarfBuzz to 11.3.3 (#7079)
contrib: update to x265 rev 13276
contrib: update to x264 rev 3222
LinGUI: Replace deprecated GTK functions  The gtk_widget_show() and gtk_widget_hide() functions are deprecated in GTK 4.10 in favor of gtk_widget_set_visible().
LinGUI: Bump GTK minimum version to 4.6  The previous minimum version, 4.4, is no longer available in any supported distribution, so 4.6 is the lowest version which can be tested.

LinGUI: Don't allow unsupported bitrates  When the maximum bitrate is reduced due to a codec or mixdown change, and the previously selected bitrate is out of range, change to the highest allowed bitrate, and vice versa for the minimum bitrate.

LinGUI: Fix maximum bitrate calculation  Use the current audio mixdown to determine the maximum bitrate in the audio defaults dialog, instead of only using the mono rate. Fixes https://github.com/HandBrake/HandBrake/issues/6997
libhb: Fallback to first audio track  If no track was found in any of the selected languages, fall back to the first audio track. Fixes https://github.com/HandBrake/HandBrake/issues/6666.
filter: optimize framerate shaper filter (#6656)  Run the metric on downscaled buffers only for high res.  Co-authored-by: Logaprakash Ramajayam <logaprakash.ramajayam@multicorewareinc.com>
contrib: update SVT-AV1 to version 3.1.0 (#7075)  Removed cpuinfo, is no longer needed.
Add some points to consider to TRANSLATION.markdown (#7064)

configure: Don't store --build flag in CONF.args  This causes `make reconfigure` to fail when a custom build dir is set, as the configure command is run inside the build dir but the flag makes it create another build dir inside that one. The same problem occurs when `make ub` on macOS is used.

flatpak: Improve build feature options  Refactor create_flatpak_manifest.py to make adding extra options easier and enable building with fdk-aac or without nvenc support. Fixes https://github.com/HandBrake/HandBrake/issues/6251
libdovi: Install to correct libdir
libdovi: Use correct Rust target for Windows ARM64
actions: Add more tools to Windows ARM64 build
actions: Upgrade Windows runners to Ubuntu 24.04
contrib: Build libiconv before dependent libraries  Ensures libiconv is available to the libraries that use it: - ffmpeg - lame - xz
qsv: set the vpp scale mode to hq by default  The previous default (compute) quality is not too good. Fix reading vpp-sm options and remove the unimplemented vpp-im option.
qsv: remove dead code
qsv: add back hb_qsv_adapters_list  It's used by the WinUI, so add it back until there is a better replacement.

LinGUI: Hide unavailable hardware encoder presets  Official hardware encoder presets are hidden, while user-created ones are shown grayed out, to avoid confusion if the hardware encoders get disabled somehow.  Fixes https://github.com/HandBrake/HandBrake/issues/6734
LinGUI: Remove unused DBus code
LinGUI: Fix typo in naming of SubtitleTrackNamePassthru
LinGUI: Fix crash on removing items from queue
LinGUI: Handle close action correctly
qsv: remove the redundant g_qsv_adapters_list list
Update NEWS
Update Version for 0.10
LinGUI: Update metainfo for Flathub (#7060)

qsv: check all the adapters to see if an encoder is available  It looks like some newer generation devices have less capabilities than older devices sometimes, or the generation check code is reporting wrong values.
build(deps): bump actions/first-interaction from 1 to 2 (#7051)
libhb: enable scale_cuda when possible and there is no crop
libhb: check whether there is an hw rotate filter available  Disable the full hwaccel path if the source is rotated and there is no hw rotate filter available.
contrib: update libtheora to 1.2.0 (#7044)
